ARABIC: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمُ ٱلْبَرْقَ خَوْفًا وَطَمَعًا وَيُنشِئُ ٱلسَّحَابَ ٱلثِّقَالَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is He Who shows you the lightning, striking fear and bringing hope; it is He Who heaps up the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who makes the lightning flash for fear and hope, and raises massive clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who causes you to see lightning that inspires you with both fear and hope, and He it is Who whips up heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is God who flashes lightning to frighten you and to give you hope. It is He who forms the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is He Who shows you the lightning, for fear and for hope, and raises the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is He Who shows you the lightning, as a fear and as a hope. And it is He Who brings up the clouds, heavy (with water).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He it is Who shows you the lightning causing fear and hope and (Who) brings up the heavy cloud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is He who shows you the lightning, for fear and hope, and produces the heavy clouds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He it is Who showeth you the lightning, a fear and a hope, and raiseth the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is He who shows you the lightning, inspiring fear and hope, and gathers up the heavy clouds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He It is who sheweth the lightning unto you for fear and for desire, and bringeth up the clouds heavy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who shows you the lightning, inspiring fear and hope, and He produces the clouds heavy [with rain].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who doth show you the lightning, by way both of fear and of hope: It is He Who doth raise up the clouds, heavy with (fertilising) rain!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is He who shows you the lightning, as a fear (for travellers) and as a hope (for those who wait for rain). And it is He Who brings up (or originates) the clouds, heavy (with water).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who shows you the lightning, for fear and hope, and Who produces laden clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is He who shows you the lightening, causing fear and hope. And He produces the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is He who shows you lightening, [causing] fear and aspiration, and generates the heavy clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [13:12] He it is Who shows you the lightning, [inspiring] fear, in travellers, of thunderbolts, and hope, for those who are at home, of rain; and He produces, He creates, the clouds that are heavy, with rain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He it is Who showeth you the lightning) rain, (a fear) for the traveller in that his clothes will be soaked (and a hope) for the sedentary for his land gets irrigated, (and raises) He creates and raises (the heavy clouds) which carry rain.
